text:
Medical imaging is central
to the diagnostic journey

and critical to realizing the
promise of precision medicine.

Recent advancements in procedure
volumes and image sizes

have strained the infrastructure
required to manage this data.
Enter AWS HealthImaging.

Healthcare providers and
medical imaging developers
can now run imaging applications in the cloud

to increase scale and performance
while reducing infrastructure costs,

enabling them to focus valuable time and
resources on delivering high-quality patient care.

HealthImaging is a HIPAA-eligible
service that enables fast access

to petabyte-scale medical imaging data
from anywhere globally,

powered by AWS’s
cloud-native APIs and infrastructure.

With HealthImaging, you can achieve
a 40% reduction in storage costs

by employing advanced compression
and running applications

from a single copy of patient
imaging data in the cloud.

With a robust partner network, you can
upgrade your medical imaging operations

to achieve the scale and performance
benefits of the cloud instantly.

Combine clinical imaging with other modalities
of health data, such as omics and health records,
to deliver insights for precision medicine.

Run AI/Machine Learning inference over the
imaging archive

with support from open-source
toolkits and cloud services.

All while saving costs on long-term archival and
maintaining sub-second image retrieval access.
Get started with AWS HealthImaging today.
